summary: Kaido Kid plotted to steal a rare Jeweled Easter Egg. Conan(together with his friends) is eager to stop the thief and uncover the mysteries surrounding the Jeweled Egg and the family who owns it.
cast: Minami Takayama|Wakana Yamazaki|Akira Kamiya|Kappei Yamaguchi|Ken'ichi Ogata|Naoko Matsui|Ryô Horikawa|Megumi Hayashibara|Chafûrin|Toshiko Fujita|Unshô Ishizuka|Yukiko Iwai|Haruhiko Jô|Fumio Matsuoka|Mitsuru Miyamoto|Yûko Miyamura|Emi Shinohara|Wataru Takagi|Nobuo Tanaka|Alison Viktorin|Eisuke Yoda|Jerry Jewell|Ikue Ôtani|Colleen Clinkenbeard|Akio Ôtsuka|R. title: Meitantei Conan: Seiki matsu no majutsushi
